title: The Dishwasher
description:
Soon after your birth, a fortune teller promised you’d be someone special. But years later you’re far from home, sleeping on a park bench and taking menial jobs to scrape by. You know you’re meant for better things. You just have to make the world see it. 

Hosted by Robbie Daymond.

Listen ad-free on Wondery+ here

Support us by supporting our sponsors!
